title: Unpacking Bezos's Blackmail
description:
In a stunning blog post by the world's richest man, Jeff Bezos directly accuses the publisher of the notorious grocery store tabloid The National Enquire of attempted blackmail. If that wasn't crazy enough, some of the theories surrounding the reasons for the blackmail trace back to the death of Jamal Khashoggi and even to the White House. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg's Chief Content Officer Marty Schenker, who helps unpack the details behind the blackmail of Jeff Bezos. 
FOLLOW UP
Marty's latest report: Bezos and Trump Proxy War Intensifies
You can follow Marty at:  @mschenker
----
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
